extendedInfo.description: Indian Springs Metropark guide by Exploration Guides.This app is everything you need to visit Indian Springs Metropark, located near White Lake, Michigan, west of Pontiac.  Whether you're hiking, canoeing, cross-country skiing, in-line skating, horseback riding, biking, bird watching, or exploring, Exploration Guides' Indian Springs Metropark gives you everything you need to make the most of your visit.Includes:* 22.5 km of fully surveyed trail maps* Suggested trails* Favorite trail: pick a trail and it highlights on the map* GPS navigation - includes the ultimate "You are here!" * Electronic compass* Camera integration: take pictures and send to email, FaceBook, and more* Major points of interest, including Exploration Guides' custom web pages with all the information you'll need* View maps with either the standard Google Maps view, or areal photography/satellite view* Park your car, touch the screen, and your car appears on the map.  Never lose your car again! (yes, you can use this outside the park, too!)* Check current weather, or the 10-day forecast for the park* Get turn-by-turn directions to the park with Google NavigationWe're all explorers.  You just need the right guide!
